column4: im trying to get x-window-system-dev but theres a never ending list of dependencies is there a way to get all the needed files at once?
there is no such package in dapperhttp://packages.ubuntu.com/cgi-bin/search_packages.pl?keywords=x-window-system-dev&searchon=names&subword=1&version=all&release=all
that will remove wine that you installed through apt-get
well, if you know how to compile things, you _should_ allso know how to uninstall them...
with out looking if it has info on how to uninstall ?
in best case its "sudo make uninstall" (if you did sudo make install)
there, where you did "sudo make install"
